bespoke-tishadow

Bespoke.js is nice

Bespoke.js TiShadow plugin makes it nicer

Click to execute code snippets

Add the data-bespoke-tishadow attribute to your code blocks

        
<code class="language-javascript" data-bespoke-tishadow>
  alert("hi");  
</code>

Send snippets to repl

Use the TiShadow.repl(fn) command

        
<a href="javascript:TiShadow.repl(function() {win.close();})">Close Window</a>

logs piped to console

In Action

        
var win = Ti.UI.createWindow({
  backgroundColor: 'blue'
});
var label = Ti.UI.createLabel({
  text: "Bespoke.js is Nice",
  color: 'white',
  font: {fontSize: '30dp', fontWeight:'bold'}
});
win.add(label);
console.debug(win);
win.open();
Close Window

In Action

All repl commands are supported

Launch TiSiren Close App
